description.value: The sticky, yellow saliva of Yeenoghu is believed to cause disease, making creatures go rabid and mad. The saliva also causes corrosive damage, and can eat through steel.Use: A creature can use an action to pour 1 vial of this corrosive saliva onto 3 pieces of magical ammunition or 1 magical melee weapon (the weapon must be magical to withstand the acid). The saliva lasts for 1 minute, or until a creature is exposed to the acid. Any creature successfully hit suffers an additional 2d10 acid damage.
